title: Orange Citrus Rice
directions: Add the olive oil to a large pot and heat over medium high heat.
Add the onion, pepper, garlic, and jalapeño to the pot and cook for a few minutes, until the onion starts to turn translucent.
Add the spices and stir well.
Add the rice, orange juice, and broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce to a simmer and let cook until all the liquid absorbs, about 30 minutes.
Remove from heat and top with scallions.
